Phobia set his comm back to Savanna's individual frequency. "I 
appreciate your response, one of your leaders have contacted me and I 
have landing clearance, I could use an escort to your base to be on 
the safe side."

The spider didn't know his new associate, she could be a transracist 
Predicon hater with a short temper, a shoot first ask questions later 
attitude, and a taste for Predicon mechfluid.

The thought scared him until he realized he was beating himself at 
his game. Psyche warfare working it's finest in his head.  This task 
was to important to worry about his fears, He was sure rhe was 
harmless, what'a the worst beast mode she could have. She sounded 
like a little kittycat.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Savanna::
> 
> "I don't know the Maximal commanders.  I am alone here on the 
> plains.  Where are you?  I will try to help you as best as I can.  
If 
> you want, you may land out here where I am and we can both find 
these 
> leaders for you."
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > "My name is Phobia, I must talk to the Maximal commanders, I must 
> put 
> > a stop to the senseless destruction on this planet. Our entire 
> > existence depends on it."
> > 
> > Phobia knew that sounding so desperate only gave the Maximals an 
> > advantage, he didn't care. The only way to put an end to this war 
> was 
> > to make everyone realize just hoe much damage they're doing to 
this 
> > timeline.
> > 
> > The spider knew that this was just another peeon in the Maximal 
> ranks 
> > but it was a start.
